title: Theatre tickets, actors and derived demand

content.question: The concept of derived demand is described by which of the following?

choices.label: A decrease in the demand for theater tickets will decrease the demand for actresses and actors.
If the salaries of basketball players increase, the quantity of basketball players demanded will decrease.
An increase in the income of consumers will increase the demand for opera tickets.
An increase in the demand for movie tickets will decrease the demand for video rentals.
A decrease in the price of movie tickets will increase the demand for movie tickets.

content.answer: A decrease in the demand for theater tickets will decrease the demand for actresses and actors.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
